radiographic_examinations.findings: Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. Evidence of a small hiatal hernia. The appendix is dilated to 10 mm and fluid-filled, with a hyperemic wall and minimal surrounding fat stranding. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. No evidence of focal lesions or hydronephrosis in the kidneys. Overall normal findings in the liver, pancreas, spleen, adrenal glands, urinary bladder, distal ureters, uterus, and bilateral adnexae.
